attributes.action: Recognise HM FORCES and EMERGENCY SERVICES with a SAPPHIRE JUBILEE MEDAL in 2017
attributes.background:
Emergency services and HM forces have been recognised through previous Jubilees for their efforts and dedication to the crown. They daily go to work risking life and limb and often sustain mental scars
We should celebrate our history as Queen Elizabeth is the longest reigning monarch.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
